main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Sarasota, Florida on November 5, 1957.
interesting points: The object appeared circular in shape and climbed to a high altitude before fading away., The brightness of the object was noted to be brighter than an airplane., The observation was made through binoculars and lasted approximately 2 minutes., The azimuth was reported at 99 degrees from the Sarasota control tower., Initial thoughts were that the object was a reflection of the sun off a high metallic object.
witness description: control tower operator at Sarasota Airport
